resources.string: Add your favorite applications to the Home screen for easy access
"Add shortcuts to often used functions – for example a friend's phone number or a website"
To get recommendations based on your location you must turn on Location services
Customize
Swipe right to open application screen menu
The Application screen can only be customized in Own Order sorting mode. Sorting mode can be changed in the Options menu.

%1$s permission
Allows an application to access and change current Xperia™ home screen configuration

If you agree below, Sony Mobile will collect usage info (apps used etc.) and location to personalize recommendations. (Android™ advertising ID and location will be shared with ad partners). Sony Mobile will handle your data according to our Privacy Policy
Allow auto rotation on the home screen
Auto rotation

You can now get quick access to your most used apps on all panes, by adding them to the area at the bottom of the screen. To add apps, simply drag and drop them where you like.
